statements: DELETE FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData WHERE acceleration_min < -2.0 AND speed_avg > 60.0;
DELETE FROM drivers WHERE driving_experience < 2 AND driving_style = 'cautious';
DELETE FROM historical_driving_data WHERE driving_date = '2021-10-15' AND driving_distance > 100;
DELETE FROM NavigationData WHERE destination = 'Airport' AND distance > 10
DELETE FROM DriverBehaviorData WHERE driver_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM NavigationData WHERE distance > 100 AND timestamp >= '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM trip_data WHERE end_location = 'City Center';
